why did you touch that thing with your bare hands
summary: We're watching Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, and after the scene when harry finds the diary in Myrtle's flooded...
body: We’re watching Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, and after the scene when harry finds the diary in Myrtle’s flooded bathroom and takes it back to Gryff Tower, my mum goes – in tones of utter revulsion – “why the hell would you pick up a book that’s been soaked in toilet juice”

reblog.comment: We’re watching Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets, and after the scene when harry finds the diary in Myrtle’s flooded bathroom and takes it back to Gryff Tower, my mum goes – in tones of utter revulsion – “why the hell would you pick up a book that’s been soaked in toilet juice”

title: Iconic Sad Book/Movie Quotes
body:
I am writing a list of iconic sad book/movie quotes and I need your help.  I have the following:

  -”I dont want to go/Mr Stark,I dont feel so good” - Spiderman -  Infinity War -”We are Groot/Dad” - Groot - Guardians of the Galaxy/Infinity War
 -“It’s over Anakin, I have the high ground!” - Obi Wan - Star Wars
 -‘you already have’ - Vader - Star Wars
 -“Okay? Okay.”
“Maybe Okay can be our always.”
-“Gus I’m a grenade!”  -Tfios
 -“Find … my mom.”
“Tell her …” - Chuck -  TMR                                                                        -”Please Tommy Please” - Newt - TMR/TDC                                                  -“Fly/run you fools“ - Gandolf - LotR
-“Always…” - Snape - Harry Potter

It doesn’t have to be from the fandoms I put there, just iconic book or/and movie quotes

You know, cause I might be making a depressing … (*shhh its a secret*)

Thanks

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: so st mungos is the only wizard hospital we hear about, and i was willing to buy that, like, wizard go to muggle hospitals for...
body: so st mungos is the only wizard hospital we hear about, and i was willing to buy that, like, wizard go to muggle hospitals for non-magical injuries/illnesses or treat themselves at home with potions or spells. but none of the wizards we see seem to know any first-aid sort of magic (the one person we do see using it outside of madame pomfrey iirc is lockhart, and we all know how well that went) and arthur and molly consider stitches to be a weird muggle thing? how is the wizarding community still alive

blog.name: tomarrywritingprompts
blog.title: Tomarry/Harrymort Writing Prompts
blog.description: All Tomarry and Harrymort prompts and inspiration! Anyone is free to use these prompts for their work, and if you do make something, add a link in a reblog! I'll promo it!

summary: Prompt: Kuroshitsuji inspired. Harry lives a happy life with his parents, until the night of his 11th birthday, when a...
body: Prompt: Kuroshitsuji inspired. Harry lives a happy life with his parents, until the night of his 11th birthday, when a mysterious enemy attacks and kills his family. A few months later, Harry turns up alive and well, followed by a demonic servant called Tom Riddle. With the demon’s help, Harry wants revenge.

reblog.comment: Prompt: Kuroshitsuji inspired. Harry lives a happy life with his parents, until the night of his 11th birthday, when a mysterious enemy attacks and kills his family. A few months later, Harry turns up alive and well, followed by a demonic servant called Tom Riddle. With the demon’s help, Harry wants revenge.

A few months later, Harry turns up alive and well, followed by a demonic servant called Tom Riddle. With the demon’s help, Harry wants revenge.

summary: After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke...
caption:
After a swift victory over a much more qualified candidate who mysteriously “pulled out for personal reasons” Donvolio Burke took his place as President of the Magical Congress of the United States of America. He immediately proposed laws that forced No-Maj and Wizard marriages to be declared to the government, with future marriages now needing written approval by the government. His new push for laws that ban No-Maj borns from attending Illvermorny has been met with uproar by the majority of the public, and has been stalled in the Magical Congress for the last 2 years. With the marauders set to return to school, the students of Ilvermorny can only try to go on living their lives as usual.

                               ILVERMORNY . 2018

         HOME // FULL PLOT // NAVIGATION

summary:
Slytherin: I wasn’t invited to the party.
Gryffindor: Yeah, people think you’re melodramatic.
Slytherin: *slaps Gryffindor with...
body:
Slytherin: I wasn’t invited to the party.

Gryffindor: Yeah, people think you’re melodramatic.

Slytherin: *slaps Gryffindor with a silk glove* Then I shall die alone.

tags: fantastic beasts and where to find them
summary:
Harry: What do you see when you look in the mirror...? 
Dumbledore: I...? I see myself holding a pair of thick, woolen...
body:
Harry: What do you see when you look in the mirror…?

Dumbledore: I…? I see myself holding a pair of thick, woolen socks

Harry: Yeah, but… Is someone wearing those socks?

Dumbledore: …

Harry: …

Dumbledore: …yes

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Rose Weasley, Louis Weasley, Albus Potter, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

summary:
Sirius: Your Animagus should have been a frog, mate.
James: Why?
Sirius: You would have got Lily to kiss you a lot sooner.

Mmmmm, no, I don’t recall having read anything like this before. Anyone else got ideas as to what this fic might be?

Love to you Xxx

summary: Hello! I was just wondering if you'd possibly know of any good character profiles, essays, etc. of both Harry and Draco? The...
question: Hello! I was just wondering if you'd possibly know of any good character profiles, essays, etc. of both Harry and Draco? The ones on pottermore are, well . . . Shit. They're bulky and slightly confusing to function, and even then, they aren't really character profiles. They're more like . . . Character history. And that's not what I'm looking for - I wanna write fanfic but I'm trying to have them in character as much as can be
answer:
I’ve never come across anything like this, I’m sorry, Nonnie. Does anyone else have anything like this.

Also, I’ve found that for me, the most helpful thing for writing in character has just been the absurd amount of fanfiction I’ve read. Read all the things!

Love to you xxx

reblog.comment:
I’ve never come across anything like this, I’m sorry, Nonnie. Does anyone else have anything like this.

Also, I’ve found that for me, the most helpful thing for writing in character has just been the absurd amount of fanfiction I’ve read. Read all the things!

Love to you xxx

Also, I’ve found that for me, the most helpful thing for writing in character has just been the absurd amount of fanfiction I’ve read. Read all the things!

Love to you xxx
